Automation includes:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":385892,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/7df3a78d-523a-4fc9-a2cb-eb405716e1d9/2.IA includes.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/7df3a78d-523a-4fc9-a2cb-eb405716e1d9/2.IA includes.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"2.IA includes.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"7df3a78d-523a-4fc9-a2cb-eb405716e1d9\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1028.9931640625,\"height\":459.44980789443196},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Leading IA Platforms\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"There are currently more than \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://research.aimultiple.com/best-rpa-software/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"80 RPA vendors globally\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" with most of the Fortune 500 using RPA software.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Among the most popular RPA platforms you can always meet (please click the links to learn more about the following RPA Platforms):\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Automation Anywhere\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" is one of the top RPA solutions focused on automating enterprise-grade companies from financial, public, telecom, HR, and many other sectors.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Among the key features are: attended and unattended automation, IP address processing, data processing, and compliance operations automation. Security is a top priority for the vendor, hence they have several types of security frameworks (role-based, network-based access management, end-to-end data protection, etc.).\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"UiPath\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" is a cloud-based automation solution that assists enterprises and government organizations in streamlining their operations.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Among the key features of UiPath are a no-code/low-code development environment, the ability to code by using multiple coding languages (Java, VB.Net, Python), and the capability for users to store licenses in a single database.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WorkFusion\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" is a software-as-a-service (SaaS) cloud computing platform that uses crowdsourced workers to teach algorithms to automate a wide variety of knowledge work, particularly in the financial services, eCommerce, and retail industries. It is the complete automation solution for global operations, combining into one platform the core capabilities you need to digitize complex business processes: business process management (BPM), robotic process automation (RPA), workforce orchestration, and machine learning-powered cognitive automation.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Pega\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" is a combined business process management and robotic process automation (RPA) platform with advanced workforce analytics from Pegasystems. Pega Platform transforms business stakeholders into citizen developers with a no-code, visual app development experience, while empowering professional developers to architect applications with a model-driven approach in a low-code environment.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Blue Prism\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" is a drag-and-drop RPA platform that allows businesses of all sizes to build RPA bots and manage the key areas of their business: operations, systems, communications, and employees.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Among the key features that Blue Prism offers to its users are speech-to-text conversion, data search, machine learning, customized process libraries, open API, and chatbots.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"IA Platforms Comparison\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":295610,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/78cd6d2e-ebd5-480c-8e7b-cda30e00bc8c/2.Platforms comparison.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/78cd6d2e-ebd5-480c-8e7b-cda30e00bc8c/2.Platforms
